docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org .
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Shows info about which breeds are judged by an expert Shows info about which breeds are judged by an expert URL : /breed_experts/ Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : [] [ { "breed": "r", "experts": [ { "id": 1, "name": "Juan", "last_name": "Andreev", "club": "Hunt", "ring": null }, { "id": 2, "name": "Anton", "last_name": "Antonov", "club": "Hunt", "ring": 1 } ] } ]
docs.title: /breed_experts/

docs.text: Shows info about which breeds are judged by an expert URL : /breed_experts/ Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {}
docs.title: Shows info about which breeds are judged by an expert

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : [] [ { "breed": "r", "experts": [ { "id": 1, "name": "Juan", "last_name": "Andreev", "club": "Hunt", "ring": null }, { "id": 2, "name": "Anton", "last_name": "Antonov", "club": "Hunt", "ring": 1 } ] } ]
docs.title: Success Responses

docs.text: Show breed counts Shows how many dogs of each breed there is URL : /breeds_count/ Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "breed_count": [ { "breed": "p", "count": 1 }, { "breed": "r", "count": 3 } ] }
docs.title: Show breed counts

docs.text: Shows how many dogs of each breed there is URL : /breeds_count/ Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {}
docs.title: Show breed counts

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "breed_count": [ { "breed": "p", "count": 1 }, { "breed": "r", "count": 3 } ] }
docs.title: Success Responses

docs.text: Show breeds of members of a specified club Shows breeds of members of a specified club URL : /club_breeds/<id> Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "name": "Royal", "members": [ { "breed": "r" } ] }}
docs.title: /club_breeds/<id>

docs.text: Shows breeds of members of a specified club URL : /club_breeds/<id> Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {}
docs.title: Show breeds of members of a specified club

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "name": "Royal", "members": [ { "breed": "r" } ] }}
docs.title: Success Responses

docs.text: Shows number of dismissed participants for the specified year Show number of dismissed participants for the specified year URL : /dismissed_count/id Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {} { "year": 2021, "dismissed_count": 2 }
docs.title: /dismissed_count/<id>

docs.text: Show number of dismissed participants for the specified year URL : /dismissed_count/id Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {}
docs.title: Shows number of dismissed participants for the specified year

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : {} { "year": 2021, "dismissed_count": 2 }
docs.title: Success Responses

docs.text: Show, delete and replace an expert Shows info about an expert URL : /experts/<id> Method : GET PUT PATCH Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "id": 1, "name": "Juan", "last_name": "Andreev", "club": "Hunt", "ring_field": 1 }
docs.title: experts/<id>

docs.text: Shows info about an expert URL : /experts/<id> Method : GET PUT PATCH Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {}
docs.title: Show, delete and replace an expert

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "id": 1, "name": "Juan", "last_name": "Andreev", "club": "Hunt", "ring_field": 1 }
docs.title: Success Responses

docs.text: Show which rings the participant was on Shows which rings the participant was on URL : /participant_ring/<id> Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "rings": [ 1 ] }
docs.title: /participant_ring/<id>

docs.text: Shows which rings the participant was on URL : /participant_ring/<id> Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {}

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "rings": [ 1 ] }
docs.title: Success Responses

docs.text: Show, delete and replace a participant Shows info about a participant URL : /participants/<id> Method : GET PUT PATCH Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "id": 1, "name": "Rex", "breed": "r", "age": 5, "family": "Rex's parents", "vaccinated": "2021-11-30", "owner_data": "Owner", "dismissed": false, "club": null, "rings": [ 1, 1 ], "medals": [ 1 ] }
docs.title: /participants/<id>

docs.text: Shows info about a participant URL : /participants/<id> Method : GET PUT PATCH Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {}
docs.title: Show, delete and replace a participant

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "id": 1, "name": "Rex", "breed": "r", "age": 5, "family": "Rex's parents", "vaccinated": "2021-11-30", "owner_data": "Owner", "dismissed": false, "club": null, "rings": [ 1, 1 ], "medals": [ 1 ] }
docs.title: Success Responses

docs.text: View a report for the specified show Creates a report URL : /report/<year> Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "participant_count": 3, "breeds": [ { "breed": "p", "count": 1 }, { "breed": "r", "count": 2 } ], "best_grades": [ { "participant": 1, "ex_sum": 30 }, { "participant": 2, "ex_sum": 27 }, { "participant": 4, "ex_sum": 31 } ], "medals": [ { "breed": "p", "medals_count": 1 }, { "breed": "r", "medals_count": 3 } ] }
docs.title: /report/<year>

docs.text: Creates a report URL : /report/<year> Method : GET Auth required : NO Permissions required : None Data constraints : {}
docs.title: View a report for the specified show

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : {} json { "participant_count": 3, "breeds": [ { "breed": "p", "count": 1 }, { "breed": "r", "count": 2 } ], "best_grades": [ { "participant": 1, "ex_sum": 30 }, { "participant": 2, "ex_sum": 27 }, { "participant": 4, "ex_sum": 31 } ], "medals": [ { "breed": "p", "medals_count": 1 }, { "breed": "r", "medals_count": 3 } ] }
docs.title: Success Responses
